"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? gibt es keine gesetze mehr, die uns vor dieser art von 체berwachung sch체tzen? #datenschutz #privatsph채re #surveillancecapitalism"

this translates to: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? are there no laws left that protect us from this kind of surveillance? #dataprotection #privacy #surveillancecapitalism"

in this post, i am criticizing the fact that companies are still able to collect and sell personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy. i am questioning the lack of effective laws and regulations that would protect individuals from such practices. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsph채re (privacy), and #surveillancecapitalism highlight the topic and connect it to broader discussions around data privacy and the exploitation of personal information for profit.
